headline: Retailer BJ's is one of TD Cowen's best ideas for 2025. Here's why.
summary: BJ's Wholesale Club (BJ) is one of TD Cowen's best ideas for 2025, TD Cowen Senior Research Analyst Oliver Chen told Yahoo Finance earlier this week. "BJ's enables you to do the full wholesale club trip in terms of buying produce and offering more food and service as well than Costco (COST). So growth opportunity ahead, they only have 3% share of a growing market, and it's a very attractive underlying wholesale club model market as well," Chen tells Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton. "And customers are focused on value." Catch TD Cowen Senior Research Analyst Oliver Chen explain why Walmart (WMT) is so well-positioned to see further growth in 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: Advocacy Group to Refile Walmart Racial Equity Audit Shareholder Action
summary: United for Respect will, for the third time, ask Walmart shareholders to vote to force the company to complete a third-party DEI audit.

headline: Is Walmart Stock Going to $115? 1 Wall Street Analyst Thinks So.
summary: In a case of a giant company getting even more massive, Walmart (NYSE: WMT) has been on quite a tear lately -- both in terms of its fundamentals and its share price.  One analyst tracking Walmart stock recently boosted his price target by a beefy 34%.  The Walmart bull in question is Ivan Feinseth of Tigress Financial Partners.

headline: Food Fight With Kroger Spells Trouble for Albertsons
summary: Antitrust enforcers have successfully blocked the merger of  Kroger  and  Albertsons  a deal that would have brought the two largest U.S. supermarket chains together.  Now Albertsons is crying over its spilled milk, and for good reason.  Last week, Albertsons said it is suing Kroger for damages, alleging that it didn’t do enough—such as offer more store divestitures—to quell regulators’ concerns.

headline: Walmart partners with China's Meituan for 30-minute deliveries 'anytime, anywhere'
summary: US retail giant Walmart is teaming up with Chinese on-demand delivery giant Meituan, promising speedy door-to-door service on the mainland, four months after it sold its stake JD.com, winding down the long-time partnership. Walmart's China unit said on its official WeChat account that all of its stores across the country are now listed on Meituan's platform, making groceries and other goods available for immediate delivery. headline: Walmart partners with delivery firm Meituan in China
summary: SHANGHAI (Reuters) -Walmart China announced on Tuesday it has entered into a new strategic partnership with China's biggest food delivery company Meituan.  The China unit of Walmart said in a post on Wechat the partnership would help it accelerate its e-commerce business, which currently accounts for nearly half of it China sales.  Stores in China have already been connected to Meituan's delivery ecosystem, the announcement added.

headline: Costco's E-Commerce Sales Just Jumped by 13%. Here's Why Investors Should Care.
summary: When it comes to retail giant Costco Wholesale (NASDAQ: COST), there are plenty of things filling up the headlines.  Costco stock is up, simply put, because business is good.  One reason to love Costco stock is its chances of long-term resilience thanks to its business model.
